item.description: os.system(command) os.open(command) subprocess.Popen(command, shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT)

item.title: ansible useage
item.description: 参考 logging root root = RootLogger(WARNING) Logger.root = root Logger.manager = Manager(Logger.root) ?? root is interface init class Logger(Filterer): def init(self, name, level=NOTSET): “”” Initialize the logger with a name and an optional level. “”” Filterer.init(self) self.name = name self.level = _checkLevel(level) self.parent = None self.propagate = 1 self.handlers = [] self.disabled = 0
